lom:description.lom:string: This is a high quality and comprehensive site designed for students in the sciences and engineering. The Center supports a "Help Desk" for students needing advice on ethical problems as well as areas with ethics resource materials, cases, codes, diversity and gender issues, problems in the corporate world, exemplars, etc. There is also an extensive bibliography and a helpful glossary of ethics terms. There is also a text version in Spanish. The content includes focus areas in engineering practice, repsonsible research, moral exemplars, content for promoting a diverse workplace, computers and software and natural sciences. Originally developed at Case Western Reserve, the site is now maintained by the National Academy of Engineering.

lom:title.lom:string: The Online Ethics Center for Engineering and Science
